QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, action_associations.id odf_pk, action_associations.PLACEMENT_TYPE as placement_type, action_associations.IS_SYSTEM as is_system, action_associations.CODE as code, action_associations.IS_ACTIVE as is_active, action_associations.ACTION_TYPE as action_type, action_associations.ACTION_CODE as action_code, action_associations.DESCRIPTION as description, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, action_associations.BLUEPRINT_ID as blueprint_id, action_associations.PROCESS_VERSION_ID as process_version_id, action_associations.SEQUENCE as sequence, (select ea.attr_api_alias from blp_visual_enabled_attrs ea, blp_available_visuals av WHERE av.visual_category = 'MODULE' and av.visual_enabled_attr_id = ea.id and av.ID =ACTION_ASSOCIATIONS.MODULE_ID) as location_code, CAPTIONS.NAME as name, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, action_associations.MODULE_ID as location, ACTION_ASSOCIATIONS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, ACTION_ASSOCIATIONS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, (select case when user_status_code='BPM_PUS_ACTIVE' then 'Active' when user_status_code='BPM_PUS_DRAFT' then 'Draft' when user_status_code='BPM_PUS_ON_HOLD' then 'Hold' end status from BPM_DEF_PROCESS_VERSIONS bpv where bpv.id=ACTION_ASSOCIATIONS.PROCESS_VERSION_ID) as status , user_context.user_id odf_user_id from action_associations action_associations inner join (select u.id user_id, u.user_name, u.locale, l.language_code from cmn_sec_users u, cmn_languages l where u.language_id = l.id) user_context on user_context.user_id = user_context.user_id JOIN srm_resources CREATED ON CREATED.user_id=action_associations.created_by JOIN srm_resources UPDATED ON UPDATED.user_id=action_associations.last_updated_by JOIN cmn_captions_nls CAPTIONS ON CAPTIONS.pk_id = action_associations.id and CAPTIONS.table_name = 'ACTION_ASSOCIATIONS' and CAPTIONS.language_code = user_context.language_code where 1 = 1
